menu.address: Avenida Marítima 29 - 38530 - Candelaria, Santa Cruz de Tenerife - Spain - Phone: +34 822 775 133 -

header.title: Maritima
header.subTitle: Dental & Esthetics
header.bottomDescription: Specialist in high-end Dental services alongside a broad range of state of the art Esthetics treatments.

tenerife.title: Welcome to Maritima
tenerife.description1: Located in the heart of Tenerife, Maritima began in 2007 as a dental clinic. Since then Maritima has quickly grown towards an all-encompassing clinic in terms of Dental, Esthetics and Natural Medicine.
tenerife.description2: Built on twenty-five years of experience, Maritima hosts an extensive amount of knowledge within its industry.
tenerife.description3: Take a look at the different treatments that we offer and feel free to reach out to us.
tenerife.description4: With the button below, you’ll be able to book in a specific treatment or a first consultation. We are more than happy to hear your personal story and find the right personal route for your specific needs.

approach.title: Personal Approach
approach.description: We consider our patients as individuals whose emotions, aspirations and objectives are unique and therefore require a dedicated and tailored approach, provided by our first-class services and recognised professionals.

treatments.title: Wide range of treatments
treatments.description: From Dental services to Esthetics, to Natural Medicine, we are here to help you out.

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.description: We are proud to guarantee that you are offered the best of each specific procedure helping to improve the quality of your life for years to come.

treatments.title: Treatments
treatments.description: At Maritima, we offer three kinds of treatments. The first being Dental care. Secondly, a range of state of the art Esthetics treatments and lastly, our diverse variety of Natural Medicines.

dental.title: Dental
dental.description: From simple check-ups to more complex restorative treatments we provide professional dental care and treatments.

esthetics.title: Esthetics
esthetics.description: From massage to more state of the art treatments like PRP and Hyaluronic acid fillings, our esthetic treatments ensure you feel the best version of yourself.

natural.title: Natural Medicine
natural.description: We are dedicated to giving each of our patients the healthy lifestyle they deserve through our knowledge and experience of natural medicine and nutrition.

appointment.title: Book an appointment
appointment.description1: Come say hi! Book a free appointment with us!
appointment.description2: Located just 20 minutes away from Tenerife's economic centre Santa Cruz, we are more than happy to welcome you in our clinic. Give us a call, and we’ll make sure to find a perfect fit for your needs.
appointment.description5: Avenida Marítima 29, 38530 Candelaria, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain
appointment.description6: Use the button below to send us an email
